page.title: 12INDUSTURY-OSBORNES
page.content: Make refrigerators for bars,public houses and restaurants,and are sold in Great Britain,Germany,Belgium,Oman, Japan,Israel,Singapore,Norway,Barbados and U.S.A.To make the refrigerator they need metal,plastic,a motor,paint insulation,glass and rubber.The metal is cut and bent and welded to make the box shape.After de_greasing,the metal is spray painted then baked in an oven.Insulation is put in then the motor and inner box are fixed.Glass doors are put on and the plastic trays are placed inside.After cleaning,the refrigerator is packed.About 65 people work in the factory and most of them live in the immediate area.
